bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding nonmedical remedial health services for children.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding nonmedical remedial health services for children. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 25-7-17.1 be amended to read as follows: 25-7-17.1. However, any Any parent who chooses nonmedical remedial health services recognized or permitted under state law in the legitimate practice of religious beliefs in lieu of medical attendance is not for that reason alone in violation of §§ 25-7-17 and 25-7-20. However, the parent is not relieved of the duty to seek necessary medical care. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
